17 //Class Declarations
21 template<typename T, size_t N>
22 class VectorWidget : public ParameterWidget {
23 public:
24  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
27  VectorWidget(CoreEngine* core, Vector<T, N>& vec,
28  QWidget* parent = nullptr,
29  double minVal = -1e20,
30  double maxVal = 1e20,
31  double numDecimals = 15,
32  const QStringList& labels = {"x:", "y:", "z:", "w:"},
33  size_t numToShow = N) :
34  ParameterWidget(core, parent),
35  m_vector(vec),
36  m_labelStrings(labels),
37  m_minAllowed(minVal),
38  m_maxAllowed(maxVal),
39  m_numDecimals(numDecimals),
40  m_numToShow(numToShow)
41  {
42  initialize();
43  }
44  virtual ~VectorWidget() {
45  }
46 
48  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
51 
53  void reinitialize(Vector<T, N>& vec) {
54  m_vector = vec;
55  update();
56  }
57 
59  virtual void update() override {
60  for (size_t i = 0; i < m_numToShow; i++) {
61  QLineEdit* lineEdit = m_lineEdits[i];
62  if (!lineEdit->hasFocus()) {
63  lineEdit->setText(QString::number(m_vector[i]));
64  }
65  }
66  }
67 
69 
70 
71 protected:
72 
73  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
76 
78  virtual void initializeWidgets() override {
79  if (m_labels.size()) Logger::Throw("Need to delete labels");
80 
81  for (size_t i = 0; i < m_numToShow; i++) {
82  m_labels.push_back(new QLabel(m_labelStrings[i % N]));
83  }
84 
85  for (size_t i = 0; i < m_numToShow; i++) {
86  m_lineEdits.push_back(new QLineEdit(QString::number(m_vector[i])));
87  m_lineEdits.back()->setMaximumWidth(75);
88  m_lineEdits.back()->setValidator(
89  new QDoubleValidator(m_minAllowed, m_maxAllowed, m_numDecimals));
90  }
91  }
92 
94  virtual void initializeConnections() override {
95  for (const auto& lineEdit : m_lineEdits) {
96  connect(lineEdit, &QLineEdit::editingFinished,
97  [this]() {
98  updateVector();
99  }
100  );
101  }
102  }
103 
105  virtual void layoutWidgets() override {
106  m_mainLayout = new QHBoxLayout();
107  m_mainLayout->setSpacing(0);
108 
109  for (size_t i = 0; i < m_numToShow; i++) {
110  QLabel* label = m_labels[i];
111  QLineEdit* lineEdit = m_lineEdits[i];
112  m_mainLayout->addWidget(label);
113  m_mainLayout->addWidget(lineEdit);
114  if (i != m_numToShow - 1)
115  m_mainLayout->addSpacing(15);
116  }
117  }
118 
120  virtual void updateVector() {
121  for (size_t i = 0; i < m_numToShow; i++) {
122  QLineEdit* lineEdit = m_lineEdits[i];
123  m_vector[i] = lineEdit->text().toDouble();
124  }
125  }
126 
128 
129 
130  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
133 
134  Vector<T, N>& m_vector;
135 
136  std::vector<QLabel*> m_labels;
137  QStringList m_labelStrings;
138  std::vector<QLineEdit*> m_lineEdits;
139 
140  double m_minAllowed;
141  double m_maxAllowed;
142  double m_numDecimals;
143  size_t m_numToShow;
144 
146 
147 };
